About Rigor Mortis again.
Thanks for Your reply, I understand Your point. It is just that Rigor Mortis is something my friend had on vinyl, and i used to have it recorded on a mono C-casette ages a go. I Got I think all Your other Entwistle torrents, but this one is the most important to me. It brings back old memories. I realllllllly would like to complete it.  So if You could help, please.
look for the entwistle as a 'new' torrent later today [after 6pm USA est]  - enjoy brother !!!!!!!
